title: AtlantiCare - Egg Harbor Township, New Jersey (NJ) Hospitals
description: Helpful support for your health journey
cleaned_text: Committed to your Health and Safety We are continually reviewing our processes to ensure we are providing the safest environment possible. Whether you need to visit as a result of COVID-19 or anything else, nothing should hold you back from getting the care you need. AtlantiCare is here to continue to treat your medical needs, in person or through telehealth. You can rest assured knowing that we have implemented the highest level of safety precautions to protect our patients, visitors and staff.
